meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class CC

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MultilabelClassifier
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BCC, CC, CCp, CCUpdateable, MCC, PCC

    public class CC
extends MultilabelClassifier
implements weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler
    CC.java - The Classifier Chains Method.
    See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. Machine Learning Journal. Springer. Vol. 85(3), pp 333-359. (May 2011).
    See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. In Proc. of 20th European Conference on Machine Learning (ECML 2009). Bled, Slovenia, September 2009.
    Note that the code was reorganised substantially since earlier versions, to accomodate additional functionality needed for e.g., MCC, PCC.
    Version:
    December 2013
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • sampleForInstanceFast

        public double[] sampleForInstanceFast(weka.core.Instance[] t_,
                             java.util.Random r)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        SampleForInstance - NOT YET IMPLEMENTED (do it yourself for now). If we are going to sample many times for each instance, it makes sense to transform the instance first, here, instead of doing it each time. Call #transformTemplates(x) first to get the templates.
        Parameters:
        t_ - Instance templates (pre-transformed)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • transformInstance

        public weka.core.Instance[] transformInstance(weka.core.Instance x)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        TransformInstances - this function is DEPRECATED. this function preloads the instances with the correct class labels ... to make the chain much faster, but CNode does not yet have this functionality ... need to do something about this!
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • probabilityForInstance

        public double[] probabilityForInstance(weka.core.Instance x,
                              double[] path)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        ProbabilityForInstance - Force our way down the imposed 'path'. For example p (y=1010|x) = [0.9,0.8,0.1,0.2]. If the product = 1, this is probably the correct path!
        Parameters:
        x - test Instance
        path - the path we want to go down
        Returns:
        the probabilities associated with this path: [p(Y_1==path[1]|x),...,p(Y_L==path[L]|x)]
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • rebuildClassifier

        public void rebuildClassifier(int[] nchain,
                     weka.core.Instances D)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Rebuild - NOT YET IMPLEMENTED. For efficiency reasons, we may want to rebuild part of the chain (which differs with nchain). If chain[] = [1,2,3,4] and nchain[] = [1,2,4,3] we only need to rebuild the final two links.
        Parameters:
        nchain - the new chain
        D - the original training data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
